metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40577 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Alertmanager handles alerts sent by client applications such as the Prometheus server. An attacker with the permission to perform POST requests on the /api/v1/alerts endpoint could be able to execute arbitrary JavaScript code on the users of Prometheus Alertmanager. This issue has been fixed in Alertmanager version 0.2.51.

criterions.comment: prometheus-alertmanager package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
